arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – The probable line-up with a nasty surprise for Paris?
arts.sum: On the eve of the clash against FC Barcelona, Paris Saint-Germain is expected to field a rejuvenated and bold team. According to RMC Sport, Vitinha (25) will not start the match. Fabian Ruiz, 29, and Joao Neves (21) are expected to return to the starting 11. Chevalier – Hakimi, Zabarnyi, Pacho, Mendes – Neves, Zaire-Emery, […]

arts.ttl: Barcelona defender on PSG’s radar for free transfer next summer
arts.sum: Barcelona could soon face an important decision regarding Eric Garcia’s future, as Paris Saint-Germain have been keeping a close eye on the defender’s situation. According to SPORT, the French club are ready to act if the player becomes available on a free transfer next summer. arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – The Parisian squad in the Youth League
arts.sum: This Wednesday, the U19 teams of Paris Saint-Germain and FC Barcelona will face off at the Johan Cruyff Stadium at 4 p.m. as part of the second round of the league phase of the 2025-2026 Youth League (the equivalent of the Champions League for this category).
